days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches later. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
